text: The Swaziland Communist Party (SWACOPA) was a communist party in Swaziland. SWACOPA was founded around 1994. It was led by Mphandlana Shongwe and Zakhe Genindza. SWACOPA's activities were suppressed by the regime, and several cadres detained. Following the removal of the 1973 decree to make way for the new constitution, the party has been one of the first to register as an official political party. == References == Category:Banned communist parties Category:Political parties in Eswatini Category:Communist parties in Africa Category:Political parties established in 1994 Category:1994 establishments in Swaziland
title: Swaziland Communist Party
